Articles.Content:
Hello! I have been messing around with wings, putting them in weird positions and this design, the IDK-2, is the best plane I have made!

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/33/screenshot5xr.png/

Just put it on full throttle, and hold s. It takes off very easily and it flies super smoothly. It is great for people who have just started flying spaceplanes too. Please tell me if you like it!

Here is the download.

http://www./?179eq3b1lqha8aq

(Just stick it in Ships>SPH)

Edited August 4, 2012 by bomb765
Very cool how well this flies with no sas, thx for the craft file
No problem. ;D I should be coming out with other planes too.
Does it have enough fuel for it to go to the north/south pole and back to the space center?
Doesn\'t look like it, if you saw KurtjMac\'s Polar flight he needed A LOT of fuel.
I don't think it does gdscei. So anybody else like it?
